Text: Won't play with Divx player and won't convert due to file format error. Thanks for nothing!!!!

The picture quality is actually very good.  It is a little soft but it hasn't been ruined with lots of denoising or sharpening and it is not at all blocky or noisy.  Add a little sharpening with your player and it looks extremely good.

There is a 4 pixel black border across the top that the ripper should have cropped but again your player ought to be able to deal with that.
